name: My Favourite Movie: Face Off Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Why does Sean want to capture Castor?
questions.explanation:
He killed his son.

	Castor was meant to kill Sean, but accidently killed his son instead.

questions.text: What are Sean and Castor's surnames?
questions.explanation:
Archer and Troy.

	Sean Archer and Castor Troy.

questions.text: What prison is Sean as Castor sent to?
questions.explanation:
Erewhon.

	If you look carefully you can see that 'erewhon' is an anagram of 'Nowhere'.

questions.text: When Sean interviews Dietrich, one of Castor's friends, what does he say to bring out Sean's anger?
options: Let me go or I'll make you and your family pay
I'm gonna kill your wife and daughter

questions.text: What is the name of Castor's brother?
Where does Sean as Castor first meet Castor as Sean?
What does Castor say to Sean a couple of times in the film?
options: You're still not better than me
questions.explanation:
You're still not having fun.

	'But you're still not having fun!'

questions.text: John Woo, the director, has a trademark that he has used in his other films that is also used in this film. What is it?
questions.correct: The hero and villain standing back to back with a thin object between them
options: The hero doing a backflip from the top of a car
The hero chasing the villain through a train
questions.explanation:
The hero and villain standing back to back with a thin object between them.

	Sean and Castor are standing back to back with a two-way mirror between them.

questions.text: When Pollux gets killed by Sean as Castor, what does Castor as Sean do to Pollux?
options: He throws him off a building
He cuts off a bit of his hair
questions.explanation:
He ties his shoelaces.

	Pollux is sort of disabled and coudn't tie his own shoelaces.

questions.text: John Travolta and Nicolas Cage play Sean and Castor, but who were the roles originally meant for?
questions.explanation:
Arnold Schwarzenegger and Sylvester Stallone.

	I wonder what the movie would have been like with these two?
